About the #monero PoW hardfork:  #Bitmain controlled ~80% of the hashpower through secret mining cartels.  That means Bitmain broke Monero's security model.  There were two choices: 1. Do nothing. Let Bitmain determine your fate. 2. Change the PoW function. Choose your own fate.
